name: inbillo
description: () - db fields db schemas user schema - for user details(userid, username, firstname, lastname, email, phone, password, reg date) accounts schema - for account balances(username/id, balance) deposits schema - for deposits made(deposit id, username/id, amount, date) assets schema - for assets owned by users(username/id, assetname, amount) portfolios schema - for user portfolios(username, assetname, amount) trades schema - for all asset trades(trade id, buyer, seller, assetname, amount, price, date) loans schema - for all lendings(loan id, lender, borrower, amount,interest, payment date,creation date)
author: Allan Juma
